alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Harnett; Johnston; Lee; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 11:58PM EDT until May 17 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Harnett County in central North Carolina... Central Lee County in central North Carolina... Southern Wake County in central North Carolina... Northwestern Johnston County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Chatham County in central North Carolina... * Until 1245 AM EDT. * At 1158 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fuquay-Varina to 6 miles southeast of Sanford to near Carthage, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Cary, Sanford, Lillington, Garner, Fuquay-Varina, Clayton, Angier, Apex and Holly Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
